markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Stairs](/Rules.aspx?ID=627)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 516 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Stairs are difficult terrain for characters moving up them, and shoddy stairs might also be uneven ground. Some temples and giant-built structures have enormous stairs that are greater difficult terrain both up and down, or might require Climbing every step.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Stairs

text: Stairs Source Core Rulebook pg. 516 4.0 Stairs are difficult terrain for characters moving up them, and shoddy stairs might also be uneven ground. Some temples and giant-built structures have enormous stairs that are greater difficult terrain both up and down, or might require Climbing every step.
